name: Who Was I
description:
Who was I is a 2D platformer game that focuses on giving a mysterious experience to the player through the view of the character in the game.

You can play this game by using this control input in your PC

A and D to move Left and Right

Space to Jump

Please do enjoy our game and give us your feedback for playing it.

Ahmad Mustofa Zakariya (Game Programmer)

Pusasoma (Pixel Art Artist)

Candra Ardianto (Game Designer)

Thank you
